${modID}:EventID.NAME: Event Name
DESCRIPTIONS: This is event text, generally used to describe what's happening.
#g~This~ #g~text~ #g~is~ #g~green~ #g~and~ #g~wavy.~
#r@RED@ #r@AND@ #r@VIBRATING@ #r@TEXT.@
#rRed #gGreen #yYellow #bBlue #pPurple. ~Wavy~ @vibrating.@
You have to mark every word individually.
You can also use [#ffffff]white[] hex color codes like this to color text.
This also works in card text! But not on keywords.
OPTIONS: Select card to remove. (You can also stick extra text like this in here.)

${modID}:AlexanderStuck.NAME: Iron Fist Alexander
DESCRIPTIONS: Hello-o? Can you hear me?.
NL Help me! I'm stuck.
NL Hello? Hellooo! Anyone!
NL Oh my stars I'm so happy to see you!
NL I am Alexander, also known as the Iron Fist. And as you can see, I'm stock here.
NL Please, can you help me out of this?
Ahh! Well played good sir. Well Played. Though that mighty wallop of yours almost spelt the end of me!
NL Ha ha ha ha! Well, I'm out now, and that's what counts.
NL I thank you, and as a token of my appreciation, I'd like you to have this
